attributes.comment:
I agree that prices should increase overtime due to inflation and that this is a
natural process in any/all agencies, business, or organizations which provide a
service to the public.

However, I feel the increase should be gradual, especially if it can be expected to
increase every two years. In other words, if the next increase were to be
scheduled for 2012 than your proposed increase is logical.

Therefore, taking into account that an increase can be expected every two years
on average than the current increase should only be of 35% not 60%+ on average.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jose Rodriguez
